```{=html}
<style>
/* Remove default margin and padding from the body */
html, body {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  height: 100%; /* Ensure body takes full viewport height */
  overflow: hidden; /* Hide potential scrollbars */
}

/* Style for the background video */
#myVideo {
  position: fixed;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  min-width: 100%;
  min-height: 100%;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  z-index: -100;
  object-fit: cover;
}

/* Optional: Add an overlay to darken the video for better text visibility */
.video-overlay {
  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5); /* Adjust the darkness here */
  z-index: -99;
}

/* Style for the content on top of the video */
.content {
  position: relative;
  z-index: 1;
  text-align: center;
  padding-top: 20vh; /* Adjust padding as needed */
  color: white;
}
</style>

<!-- The background video element -->
<video autoplay muted loop playsinline id="myVideo">
  <source src="./background.mp4" type="video/mp4">
  <!-- Fallback content for browsers that don't support the video tag -->
  Your browser does not support the video tag.
</video>

<!-- Optional overlay -->
<div class="video-overlay"></div>
```
